name: v2.16.0 Release
body:
## What's Changed
* expected calculation and subsampling by @suhas-rao in https://github.com/aidenlab/Juicebox/pull/989
* bug fix for default settings (not using subsampling) by @suhas-rao in https://github.com/aidenlab/Juicebox/pull/990


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aidenlab/Juicebox/compare/v2.15.08...v2.16.00
